name: pagedjs
description: Chunks up a document into paged media flows and applies print styles
author: Fred Chasen

scripts.legacy: babel dist/paged.js --out-file dist/paged.legacy.js && babel dist/paged.polyfill.js --out-file dist/paged.polyfill.legacy.js
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run compile
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run compile && npm run legacy
scripts.docker-test: docker build -t pagedmedia/pagedjs . && docker run -it --rm --ipc=host --user pwuser --security-opt 'seccomp=seccomp.json' -v $(pwd)/specs:/home/pwuser/pagedjs/specs pagedmedia/pagedjs npm test
scripts.docker-specs: docker build -t pagedmedia/pagedjs . && docker run -it --rm --ipc=host -v $(pwd)/specs:/home/pwuser/pagedjs/specs pagedmedia/pagedjs npm run specs
scripts.docker-update-specs: docker build -t pagedmedia/pagedjs . && docker run -it --rm --ipc=host -v $(pwd)/specs:/home/pwuser/pagedjs/specs pagedmedia/pagedjs npm run specs -- -u
